name: ClimateCloset
0:
”Alexa, open climate closet”
”Alexa, launch climate closet”
”Alexa, climate closet”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: climate closet
des:
Do you have to wear a jacket to venture outside your house? Have you ever struggled to pick a jacket? Felt underdressed or overdressed when you are outside your sweet house? Have no worries from now! Alexa can help you. This skill is designed to recommend you a perfect jacket based on the outside weather.

When you try out the skill for the first, you are asked to list the jackets you have, from lightest to heaviest, in terms of protection level. You need to list by saying - "I have …". Then you are asked a question about the city. Please mention it likewise below example: If you are living in New York, then say - "New York". Once you answer such questions, the Alexa skill will recommend you a jacket. You won't be asked the jacket listing question from your second visit unless you are visiting the skill after 5/10/15/… visits.

Example interaction -
1. You say - "open climate closet"
Alexa asks "to mention the jackets from lightest to heaviest"
2. You say - 'I have …' <- These jackets'
Alexa asks in which city do you live in
- If your jackets are not all listed, then please again say - I have <your left out jackets>
- The skill will take care of adding your left over items.
3. You say - "Boston" (Any city name)
Alexa gives you the recommendation
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
